About Si Juki : Lost in Jukiverse

Jukiverse is 3456 Jukis based on Indonesia comic character, Si Juki. Si Juki created and authored by Faza Meonk since 2010. Jukiverse is a bridge for IP Brand development from Web2 to Web3.
